description: Triangle T(n,k) of number of digraphs with a source and a sink on n unlabeled nodes and k arcs, k=0,1,..,n*(n-1).
references: V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, Enumeration of labeled initially-finally connected digraphs, Scientific review, Serbian Scientific Society, 19-20 (1996), p. 246.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda, Sep 14 2000
